title: Collaborative Learning Pattern-Based Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning design training program for elementary educators (professionals) to improve language proficiency

learning_goals: Learners can apply five fundamental patterns to structure collaborative learning flows in a CSCL environment
Learners can adapt and combine collaborative learning patterns to complete instructional designs tailored to language education contexts
Learners can evaluate and improve their designed collaborative learning scenarios through peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
